column1: 39 years ago, a book was written about the corona virus and Wuhan Province. The book "They Eyes of Darkness" by author Dean Koontz was published on 10th may 1981 pic.twitter.com/6p53pwgdR7

You are trying to ban "burqa" but have you ever seen your doctors and nurses working round the clock fighting corona virus ? They are essentially wearing "white burqa"! That's karma! And that's God's way of making his point!
